user.title: Solar Web
user.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/drc38/Fronius_solarweb

data.accesskeyid: API access key id, default if using app login details
data.accesskeyvalue: API access key value, default if using app login details
data.login: Login name, not required if using custom generated key id/values
data.password: Login password, not required if using custom generated key id/values

error.auth: Error setting up integration, check logs.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
